column4: i'm having a problem with chmod i type in chown apache /var/html/orangehrm/
it tells me there is no such user
isnt apache a user by default when you install apache?
the command should be: chown -R www-data:www-data /var/html/orangehrm/
drag and drop it to the places pane on the left of the file manager
thats .. a lot of things.. starting with "boot animation".. to the lightdm theme and then finally the wallpaper.. each is a different thing
and for the wallpaper, just right click on the desktop
i just installed 10.04 on that particular laptop so i guess i now have the ideas to study anyway
beaware that there might be some changes depending on the version being discussed, but you'll get an idea about where to look
